## askgpt chat

Chat with ChatGPT

```
askgpt chat [flags]
```

### Examples

```
askgpt chat
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                  help for chat
  -t, --temperature float32   Temperature of the model. Higher values will result in more creative completions, but also more likelihood of nonsensical text. Try 0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0
```
